      • setSamples

        public void setSamples(int[] samples)
        Set integer samples of a wavfile Integer sample is 0-padded in order to match the length of STFT(short-time Fourier transform )
        定義:
        setSamples インタフェース内 AcousticFrontEnd
        パラメータ:
        int - [] samples

      • next

        public boolean next()
        Set the next integer samples for STFT If there is samples to calculate in the net place, this method return True, if not, return False
        定義:
        next インタフェース内 AcousticFrontEnd
        戻り値:
        true if there is another samples to calculate, false otherwise
